name: part_007
file: tmp_【#沙花叉クロヱ1周年記念ライブ】シャチ出没中【沙花叉クロヱ⧸ホロライブ】 [YOnasn4-BH0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Sakamata Chloe plays a slot machine game during her 1st-anniversary live.
Performance of the song 'ultra soul' by B'z.
